name: Panpour

evolution.description: Panpour can evolve into Simipour at level 8 and above, with the help of a Water Stone. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Spray Pokémon. It does not thrive in dry environments. It keeps itself damp by shooting water stored in its head tuft from its tail.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.
